trans-unit.target: Impulses

trans-unit.source: In 2D plots the border is normally drawn on top of all plots elements (front). If you want the border to be drawn behind the plot elements, use set border back.
trans-unit.target: 在2D绘图中，边框通常绘制在所有绘图元素的顶部（front）。如果要在绘图元素后面绘制边框，请使用set border back。

trans-unit.source: In 2D, xrange and yrange determine the extent of the axes, trange determines the range of the parametric variable in parametric mode or the range of the angle in polar mode. Similarly in parametric 3D, xrange, yrange, and zrange govern the axes and urange and vrange govern the parametric variables.
trans-unit.target: 在2D中，xrange和yrange确定轴的范围，trange确定在参数模式下参数变量的范围或在极坐标模式下角度的范围。类似地，在参数3D中，xrange，yrange和zrange控制轴，而urange和vrange控制参数变量。

trans-unit.source: In 3D plots grid lines at x- and y- axis tic positions are by default drawn only on the base plane parallel to z=0. The vertical keyword activates drawing grid lines in the xz and yz planes also, running from zmin to zmax.
trans-unit.target: 在3D图中，默认情况下，仅在平行于z = 0的基准面上绘制x和y轴tic位置的网格线。的垂直关键字激活绘图网格线在xz和yz平面也从ZMIN到ZMAX运行。

trans-unit.source: In 3d mode (splot command), the special keyword palette is allowed as a shorthand for "linetype palette z". The color value corresponds to the z-value (elevation) of the splot, and varies smoothly along a line or surface.
trans-unit.target: 在3d模式（splot命令）中，特殊关键字“ 调色板”被允许作为“线型调色板z”的简写。颜色值对应于绘图的z值（高程），并沿直线或曲面平滑变化。

trans-unit.source: In fit, the term "error" is used in two different contexts, data error estimates and parameter error estimates.
trans-unit.target: 在配合，术语“错误”，在两个不同的环境中，数据的错误估计和参数误差估计被使用。

trans-unit.source: In monochrome mode successive line types cycle through dash patterns. linewidth <factor> multiplies all line widths by this factor. dashlength <factor> is useful for thick lines. <fontname> is the name of a font; and <fontsize> is the size of the font in points.
trans-unit.target: 在单色模式下，连续的线型会在虚线图案之间循环。linewidth <factor>将所有线宽乘以该系数。dashlength <factor>对于粗线很有用。<fontname>是字体的名称；和<字号>是在点的字体大小。

trans-unit.source: In splot, control over the scales and labels of the axes are the same as with plot except that there is also a z axis and labeling the x2 and y2 axes is possible only for pseudo-2D plots created using set view map.
trans-unit.target: 在Splot中，对轴的比例和标签的控制与图相同，不同之处在于，还有z轴，并且仅对于使用set view map创建的伪2D图，可以标记x2和y2轴。

trans-unit.source: In standalone mode, the font size is taken from the given font size in the set terminal command. To be able to use a specified font size, a file "size<size>.clo" has to reside in the LaTeX search path. By default, 10pt, 11pt, and 12pt are supported. If the package "extsizes" is installed, 8pt, 9pt, 14pt, 17pt, and 20pt are added.
trans-unit.target: 在独立模式下，字体大小取自set terminal命令中给定的字体大小。为了能够使用指定的字体大小，文件“ size <size> .clo”必须驻留在LaTeX搜索路径中。默认情况下，支持10pt，11pt和12pt。如果安装了软件包“ extsizes”，则会添加8pt，9pt，14pt，17pt和20pt。

trans-unit.source: In X the window cannot be resized using window manager handles, but the mode can be given with the mode option, e.g.:
trans-unit.target: 在X中,不能使用窗口管理器的句柄来调整窗口的大小,但是可以通过模式选项来给出模式,例如。

trans-unit.source: In a parameter file, each parameter to be varied and a corresponding initial value are specified, one per line, in the form
trans-unit.target: 在参数文件中,每行指定一个要改变的参数和相应的初始值,其形式为:1.

trans-unit.source: In a uniform grid matrix the z-values are read in a row at a time, i. e.,
trans-unit.target: 在均匀网格矩阵中,z值每次以行为单位进行读取,即:。

trans-unit.source: In addition to printed output, the program stores the individual statistics into three sets of variables. The first set of variables reports how the data is laid out in the file:
trans-unit.target: 除了打印输出外,该程序还将各个统计数据存储到三组变量中。第一组变量报告数据在文件中的布局方式。

trans-unit.source: In addition to string constants, most gnuplot commands also accept a string variable, a string expression, or a function that returns a string. For example, the following four methods of creating a plot all result in the same plot title:
trans-unit.target: 除了字符串常量,大多数gnuplot命令还接受一个字符串变量、一个字符串表达式或一个返回字符串的函数。例如,以下四种创建绘图的方法都会产生相同的绘图标题。

trans-unit.source: In addition to the X Toolkit options, the following options may be specified on the command line when starting gnuplot or as resources in your ".Xdefaults" file (note that raise and persist can be overridden later by set term x11 [no]raise [no]persist):
trans-unit.target: 除了X工具箱选项，下面的选项，可以在命令行上启动时指定的gnuplot或在你的“的.Xdefaults”文件资源（注意，提高和坚持以后可以覆盖一组项X11 [无]加薪[ no] persist）：

trans-unit.source: In addition to the X Toolkit options, the following options may be specified on the command line when starting gnuplot or as resources in your ".Xdefaults" file:
trans-unit.target: 除了X Toolkit选项之外，在启动gnuplot时，还可以在命令行上指定以下选项，或者作为“ .Xdefaults”文件中的资源：

trans-unit.source: In addition to the actual columns 1...N in the input data file, gnuplot presents data from several "pseudo-columns" that hold bookkeeping information. E.g. $0 or column(0) returns the sequence number of this data record within a dataset. Please see pseudocolumns.
trans-unit.target: 除了输入数据文件中的实际列1 ... N之外，gnuplot还会显示来自几个包含簿记信息的“伪列”的数据。例如，$ 0或column（0）返回此数据记录在数据集中的序列号。请参阅伪列。

trans-unit.source: In addition, the show plot add2history command adds this current plot command into the history. It is useful if you have used replot to add more curves to the current plot and you want to edit the whole command now.
trans-unit.target: 另外，show plot add2history命令将此当前plot命令添加到history中。如果您已使用replot将更多曲线添加到当前绘图中，并且想要立即编辑整个命令，则将非常有用。

trans-unit.source: In all cases an explicit title or notitle keyword in the plot command itself will override the default from set key autotitle.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情况下，plot命令本身中的显式title或notitle关键字将覆盖set key autotitle中的默认值。

trans-unit.source: In all cases the coordinates of the mouse are returned in variables MOUSE_X, MOUSE_Y, MOUSE_X2, MOUSE_Y2. See mouse variables.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情况下，鼠标的坐标都以变量MOUSE_X，MOUSE_Y，MOUSE_X2，MOUSE_Y2返回。请参阅鼠标变量。

trans-unit.source: In all cases, the numbers of each record of a data file must be separated by white space (one or more blanks or tabs) unless a format specifier is provided by the using option. This white space divides each record into columns. However, whitespace inside a pair of double quotes is ignored when counting columns, so the following datafile line has three columns:
trans-unit.target: 在所有情况下，除非使用选项提供了格式说明符，否则数据文件的每个记录的编号都必须用空格（一个或多个空格或制表符）分隔。此空白将每个记录分为几列。但是，对列进行计数时，一对双引号内的空格将被忽略，因此以下数据文件行包含三列：

trans-unit.source: In all of the above cases, optional variable color data may be given in an additional last (3th, 4th, 5th or 6th) column. See colorspec for further information.
trans-unit.target: 在上述所有情况下，都可以在其他最后（第3，第4，第5或第6）列中提供可选的可变颜色数据。有关更多信息，请参见colorspec。

trans-unit.source: In brief, binary and matrix indicate that the data are in a special form, index selects which data sets in a multi-data-set file are to be plotted, every specifies which datalines (subsets) within a single data set are to be plotted, and using determines how the columns within a single record are to be interpreted.
trans-unit.target: 简而言之，二进制和矩阵表示数据采用特殊格式，索引选择要绘制多数据集文件中的哪些数据集，每一个都指定要绘制单个数据集中的哪些数据线（子集）。和使用确定如何解释单个记录中的列。

trans-unit.source: In case of error estimates of the independent variables, these weights are further multiplied by fitting function derivatives according to the "effective variance method" (Jay Orear, Am. J. Phys., Vol. 50, 1982).
trans-unit.target: 在对独立变量进行误差估计的情况下,根据 "有效方差法"(Jay Orear,Am.J.Phys.,第50卷,1982),通过拟合函数导数进一步乘以这些权重。

trans-unit.source: In contrast to the usual display in gnuplot, hidden line removal actually treats the given function or data grids as real surfaces that can't be seen through, so plot elements behind the surface will be hidden by it. For this to work, the surface needs to have 'grid structure' (see splot datafile about this), and it has to be drawn with lines or with linespoints.
trans-unit.target: 与gnuplot中的常规显示相反，隐藏线去除实际上将给定的函数或数据网格视为无法看穿的真实表面，因此该表面后面的绘图元素将被其隐藏。对于这项工作，该表面需要具有“网格结构”（参见splot数据文件有关此），而且它有要被绘制用线条或带linespoints。

trans-unit.source: In datafiles, blank records (records with no characters other than blanks and a newline and/or carriage return) are significant.
trans-unit.target: 在数据文件中,空白记录(除了空白和换行和/或回车以外没有其他字符的记录)是重要的。

trans-unit.source: In each case you can further customize the length of the sequence and the colors used. See set linetype, colors.
trans-unit.target: 在每种情况下，您都可以进一步自定义序列的长度和所使用的颜色。请参阅设置线型，颜色。

trans-unit.source: In earlier versions of gnuplot, some terminal types used the values from set size to control also the size of the output canvas; others did not. The use of 'set size' for this purpose was deprecated in version 4.2. Almost all terminals now behave as follows:
trans-unit.target: 在gnuplot的早期版本中，某些终端类型使用设置大小中的值来控制输出画布的大小。其他人没有。在版本4.2中已弃用“设置大小”。现在几乎所有终端的行为如下：

trans-unit.source: In either case the option limits the filled area to one side of the bounding line or curve.
trans-unit.target: 无论哪种情况,该选项都会将填充的区域限制在边界线或曲线的一侧。

trans-unit.source: In fact, "pfbtopfa" and "pfb2ps" do the same job. "pfbtopfa" puts the resulting pfa code into a file, whereas "pfbtops" writes it to standard output.
trans-unit.target: 事实上,"pfbtopfa "和 "pfb2ps "做着同样的工作。"pfbtopfa "将生成的pfa代码放入文件中,而 "pfbtops "则将其写入标准输出。

trans-unit.source: In fact, you can use a constant expression for the column number, provided it doesn't start with an opening parenthesis; constructs like using 0+(complicated expression) can be used. The crucial point is that the expression is evaluated once if it doesn't start with a left parenthesis, or once for each data point read if it does.
trans-unit.target: 实际上，您可以对列号使用常量表达式，只要它不以左括号开头；样构建使用0+（复杂表达）可被使用。至关重要的一点是，如果表达式不是以左括号开头，则对表达式求值一次，如果是，则对每个读取的数据点求值一次。

trans-unit.source: In general, any mathematical expression accepted by C, FORTRAN, Pascal, or BASIC is valid. The precedence of these operators is determined by the specifications of the C programming language. White space (spaces and tabs) is ignored inside expressions.
trans-unit.target: 一般来说,任何被C、FORTRAN、Pascal或BASIC接受的数学表达式都是有效的。这些运算符的优先级由C编程语言的规范决定。表达式内部的白色空间(空格和制表符)会被忽略。

trans-unit.source: In general, colors can be specified using named colors, rgb (red, green, blue) components, hsv (hue, saturation, value) components, or a coordinate along the current pm3d palette.
trans-unit.target: 一般来说,可以使用命名颜色、rgb(红、绿、蓝)组件、hsv(色相、饱和度、数值)组件或沿着当前pm3d调色板的坐标来指定颜色。

trans-unit.source: In general, elements on the command line will only be evaluated as possible string variables if they are not otherwise recognizable as part of the normal gnuplot syntax. So the following sequence of commands is legal, although probably should be avoided so as not to cause confusion:
trans-unit.target: 一般来说,命令行上的元素只有在它们不能被识别为正常gnuplot语法的一部分时,才会被评估为可能的字符串变量。所以下面的命令序列是合法的,尽管可能应该避免,以免造成混乱。

trans-unit.source: In gnuplot version 5 the dash pattern (dashtype) is a separate property associated with each line, analogous to linecolor or linewidth. It is not necessary to place the current terminal in a special mode just to draw dashed lines. I.e. the command set term <termname> {solid|dashed} is now ignored. If backwards compatibility with old scripts written for version 4 is required, the following lines can be used instead:
trans-unit.target: 在gnuplot版本5中，破折号模式（dashtype）是与每行关联的单独属性，类似于linecolor或linewidth。不必仅仅为了绘制虚线就将当前端子置于特殊模式。即命令集术语<termname> {实线|虚线}现在被忽略。如果需要与为版本4编写的旧脚本向后兼容，则可以使用以下几行：

trans-unit.source: In hidden3d plots the lines making up the border are normally subject to the same hidden3d processing as the plot elements. set border behind will override this default.
trans-unit.target: 在hidden3d绘图中，构成边框的线通常要经受与绘图元素相同的hidden3d处理。在后面设置边框会覆盖此默认设置。

trans-unit.source: In multi-branch fitting, multiple data sets can be simultaneously fit with functions of one independent variable having common parameters by minimizing the total WSSR. The function and parameters (branch) for each data set are selected by using a 'pseudo-variable', e.g., either the dataline number (a 'column' index of -1) or the datafile index (-2), as the second independent variable.
trans-unit.target: 在多分支拟合中,通过最小化总的WSSR,多个数据集可以同时用具有共同参数的一个独立变量的函数进行拟合。每个数据集的函数和参数(分支)是通过使用一个 "伪变量 "来选择的,例如,作为第二个独立变量的数据线号("列 "指数为-1)或数据文件指数(-2)。

trans-unit.source: In non-parametric mode, ranges must be given in the order
trans-unit.target: 在非参数模式下,范围必须按以下顺序给出。

trans-unit.source: In non-standalone (input) graphic only parameters size to select graphic size, fontscale to scale all the labels for a factor <fontscale> and font size, make sense, the rest is silently ignored and should be configured in the .tex file which inputs the graphic. It's highly recommended to set the proper fontsize if document font differs from 12pt, so that gnuplot will know how much space to reserve for labels.
trans-unit.target: 在非独立（输入）的仅图形参数中，参数大小选择图形大小，字体缩放以比例缩放所有标签为<fontscale>和字体大小，这很有意义，其余参数将被忽略，应在.tex文件中进行配置输入图形。如果文档字体与12pt不同，强烈建议设置适当的字体大小，以便gnuplot知道为标签保留多少空间。

trans-unit.source: In older gnuplot versions, each terminal type provided a set of distinct "linetypes" that could differ in color, in thickness, in dot/dash pattern, or in some combination of color and dot/dash. These colors and patterns were not guaranteed to be consistent across different terminal types although most used the color sequence red/green/blue/magenta/cyan/yellow. You can select this old behaviour via the command set colorsequence classic, but by default gnuplot version 5 uses a terminal-independent sequence of 8 colors.
trans-unit.target: 在较早的gnuplot版本中，每种终端类型都提供了一组不同的“线型”，这些线型的颜色，厚度，点/虚线图案或颜色和点/虚线的某种组合可能不同。尽管大多数使用红色/绿色/蓝色/品红色/青色/黄色的颜色顺序，但不能保证这些颜色和图案在不同的终端类型之间保持一致。您可以通过命令set colorsequence classic选择此旧行为，但是默认情况下，gnuplot版本5使用与终端无关的8种颜色序列。

trans-unit.source: In order of preference, graphs may be printed in the following ways:
trans-unit.target: 按照偏好的顺序,可以用以下方式打印图形。

trans-unit.source: In order to correctly draw the key box, use
trans-unit.target: 为了正确地绘制钥匙盒,请使用

trans-unit.source: In order to draw contours, the data should be organized as "grid data". In such a file all the points for a single y-isoline are listed, then all the points for the next y-isoline, and so on. A single blank line (a line containing no characters other than blank spaces and a carriage return and/or a line feed) separates one y-isoline from the next.
trans-unit.target: 为了绘制等高线,数据应该被组织成 "网格数据"。在这样的文件中,一个y-等值线的所有点都被列出,然后是下一个y-等值线的所有点,以此类推。一个空行(除了空格和回车和/或换行外,没有其他字符的行)将一个y-等值线和下一个y-等值线分开。

trans-unit.source: In order to reduce the size of postscript files, the gray value and not all three calculated r,g,b values are written to the file. Therefore the analytical formulae are coded directly in the postscript language as a header just before the pm3d drawing, see /g and /cF definitions. Usually, it makes sense to write therein definitions of only the 3 formulae used. But for multiplot or any other reason you may want to manually edit the transformations directly in the postscript file. This is the default option nops_allcF. Using the option ps_allcF writes postscript definitions of all formulae. This you may find interesting if you want to edit the postscript file in order to have different palettes for different surfaces in one graph. Well, you can achieve this functionality by multiplot with fixed origin and size.
trans-unit.target: 为了减小后记文件的大小，将灰度值（而不是全部三个计算出的r，g，b值）写入文件。因此，分析公式直接以postscript语言编码为pm3d图形之前的标题，请参见/ g和/ cF定义。通常，仅在其中写入所用3个公式的定义才有意义。但是出于多重绘图或任何其他原因，您可能希望直接在后记文件中手动编辑转换。这是默认选项nops_allcF。使用选项ps_allcF可以编写所有公式的后记定义。如果要编辑后记文件，以便在一张图中的不同表面具有不同的调色板，这可能会很有趣。好吧，您可以通过以下方式实现此功能的multiplot固定产地和大小。

trans-unit.source: In parametric mode, ranges must be given in the order
trans-unit.target: 在参数模式下,范围必须按以下顺序给出。

trans-unit.source: In parametric mode, the order is
trans-unit.target: 在参数模式下,顺序为

trans-unit.source: In polar coordinates, the dummy variable (t) represents an angle theta. The default range of t is [0:2*pi], or [0:360] if degree units have been selected (see set angles).
trans-unit.target: 在极坐标中，虚拟变量（t）表示角度theta。t的默认范围是[0：2 * pi]，如果选择了度数单位，则为[0：360]（请参阅设置角度）。

trans-unit.source: In polar mode, rrange determines the radial range plotted. <rmin> acts as an additive constant to the radius, whereas <rmax> acts as a clip to the radius — no point with radius greater than <rmax> will be plotted. xrange and yrange are affected — the ranges can be set as if the graph was of r(t)-rmin, with rmin added to all the labels.
trans-unit.target: 在极坐标模式下，rrange确定绘制的径向范围。<rmin>充当半径的加法常量，而<rmax>充当半径的裁剪-不会绘制半径大于<rmax>的点。xrange和yrange受到影响-可以设置范围，就好像图形是r（t）-rmin一样，并将rmin添加到所有标签上。

trans-unit.source: In some cases, the given coordinate is not an absolute position but a relative value (e.g., the second position in set arrow ... rto). In most cases, the given value serves as difference to the first position. If the given coordinate belongs to a log-scaled axis, a relative value is interpreted as multiplier. For example,
trans-unit.target: 在某些情况下，给定坐标不是绝对位置，而是相对值（例如，设置箭头 ... rto中的第二位置）。在大多数情况下，给定值用作与第一位置的差。如果给定坐标属于对数刻度轴，则将相对值解释为乘数。例如，

trans-unit.source: In standalone mode, the font size is taken from the given font size in the set terminal command. To be able to use a specified font size, a file "size<size>.clo" has to reside in the LaTeX search path. By default, 10pt, 11pt, and 12pt are supported. If the package "extsizes" is installed, 8pt, 9pt, 14pt, 17pt, and 20pt are added.
trans-unit.target: 在独立模式下，字体大小取自set terminal命令中给定的字体大小。为了能够使用指定的字体大小，文件“ size <size> .clo”必须驻留在LaTeX搜索路径中。默认情况下，支持10pt，11pt和12pt。如果安装了软件包“ extsizes”，则会添加8pt，9pt，14pt，17pt和20pt。

trans-unit.source: In the set term command, you may specify a font name which does not appear in the default font table. In that case, a new font table is constructed with the specified font as its first entry. You must ensure that the spelling, capitalization, and spacing of the name are appropriate for the application that will read the CGM file. (Gnuplot and any MIL-D-28003A compliant application ignore case in font names.) If you need to add several new fonts, use several set term commands.
trans-unit.target: 在set term命令中，您可以指定一个不会出现在默认字体表中的字体名称。在这种情况下，将使用指定的字体作为其第一项来构造新的字体表。您必须确保名称的拼写，大写和空格适合于将读取CGM文件的应用程序。 （Gnuplot和任何符合MIL-D-28003A的应用程序都忽略字体名称中的大小写。）如果需要添加几种新字体，请使用多种set term命令。

trans-unit.source: In the absence of a using specification, the fit implicitly assumes there is only a single independent variable. If a using specification is given, there can be up to 12 independent variables (and more if specially configured at compile time).

trans-unit.source: In the first case <var> is a string variable that successively evaluates to single-word substrings 1 to N of the string in the iteration specifier. In the second case <start>, <end>, and <increment> are integers or integer expressions.
trans-unit.target: 在第一种情况下，<var>是一个字符串变量，该变量在迭代说明符中连续求值为该字符串的单个单词子字符串1至N。在第二种情况下，<start>，<end>和<increment>是整数或整数表达式。

trans-unit.source: In the linear case, parameter values can be determined by comparatively simple linear algebra, in one direct step. However LLS is a special case which is also solved along with more general NLLS problems by the iterative procedure that gnuplot uses. fit attempts to find the minimum by doing a search. Each step (iteration) calculates WSSR with a new set of parameter values. The Marquardt-Levenberg algorithm selects the parameter values for the next iteration. The process continues until a preset criterion is met, either (1) the fit has "converged" (the relative change in WSSR is less than a certain limit, see set fit limit), or (2) it reaches a preset iteration count limit (see set fit maxiter). The fit may also be interrupted and subsequently halted from the keyboard (see fit). The user variable FIT_CONVERGED contains 1 if the previous fit command terminated due to convergence; it contains 0 if the previous fit terminated for any other reason. FIT_NITER contains the number of iterations that were done during the last fit.
trans-unit.target: 在线性情况下，可以在一个直接步骤中通过比较简单的线性代数确定参数值。但是LLS是一个特例，它也可以通过gnuplot使用的迭代过程与更一般的NLLS问题一起解决。适合尝试通过搜索找到最小值。每个步骤（迭代）都会使用一组新的参数值来计算WSSR。 Marquardt-Levenberg算法选择下一个迭代的参数值。该过程一直持续到满足预设标准为止，或者（1）拟合已“收敛”（WSSR的相对变化小于某个限制，请参阅set fit limit），或者（2）达到预设的迭代计数限制（请参阅set fit maxiter）。也可能会中断装配并随后从键盘中止装配（请参见fit）。如果先前的fit命令由于收敛而终止，则用户变量FIT_CONVERGED包含1；如果先前的拟合因任何其他原因终止，则它包含0。FIT_NITER包含上一次拟合期间执行的迭代次数。

Use of timefmt to interpret input data, range, and tic positions is triggered by set xdata time.

trans-unit.source: Internally all times and dates are converted to the number of seconds from the year 1970. The command set timefmt defines the default format for all inputs: data files, ranges, tics, label positions – anything that accepts a time data value defaults to receiving it in this format. Only one default format can be in effect at a given time. Thus if both x and y data in a file are time/date, by default they are interpreted in the same format. However this default can be replaced when reading any particular file or column of input using the timecolumn function in the corresponding using specifier.
trans-unit.target: 在内部，所有时间和日期都将转换为从1970年开始的秒数。命令集timefmt定义了所有输入的默认格式：数据文件，范围，抽动，标签位置–任何接受时间的数据都默认接收它以这种格式。在给定时间只能使用一种默认格式。因此，如果文件中的x和y数据均为时间/日期，则默认情况下它们以相同格式解释。但是，当使用相应的使用说明符中的timecolumn函数读取任何特定文件或输入列时，可以替换此默认设置。

trans-unit.source: Let us first describe how a map/surface is drawn. The input data come from an evaluated function or from an splot data file. Each surface consists of a sequence of separate scans (isolines). The pm3d algorithm fills the region between two neighbouring points in one scan with another two points in the next scan by a gray (or color) according to z-values (or according to an additional 'color' column, see help for using) of these 4 corners; by default the 4 corner values are averaged, but this can be changed by the option corners2color. In order to get a reasonable surface, the neighbouring scans should not cross and the number of points in the neighbouring scans should not differ too much; of course, the best plot is with scans having same number of points. There are no other requirements (e.g. the data need not be gridded). Another advantage is that the pm3d algorithm does not draw anything outside of the input (measured or calculated) region.
trans-unit.target: 让我们首先描述如何绘制地图/表面。输入数据来自评估函数或散点图数据文件。每个表面由一系列独立的扫描（等值线）组成。 pm3d算法根据z值（或根据附加的“颜色”列，请参见使用帮助），通过灰色（或颜色）将一次扫描中两个相邻点之间的区域填充为下一次扫描中的另外两个点，这四个角落；默认情况下，对4个角值进行平均，但是可以通过corners2color选项更改。为了获得合理的表面，相邻扫描不应相交，并且相邻扫描中的点数不应相差太大；当然，最好的绘图是点数相同的扫描。没有其他要求（例如，数据不需要网格化）。另一个优点是pm3d算法不会在输入（测量或计算）区域之外绘制任何内容。

trans-unit.source: Logical AND (&&) and OR (||) short-circuit the way they do in C. That is, the second && operand is not evaluated if the first is false; the second || operand is not evaluated if the first is true.

trans-unit.source: Make sure that there is no mutual dependency among parameters of the function you are fitting. For example, don't try to fit a*exp(x+b), because a*exp(x+b)=a*exp(b)*exp(x). Instead, fit either a*exp(x) or exp(x+b).

The persist option tells gnuplot to leave these windows open when the main program exits. It has no effect on non-interactive terminal output. For example if you issue the command

trans-unit.source: Many terminal types support an enhanced text mode in which additional formatting information is embedded in the text string. For example, "x^2" will write x-squared as we are used to seeing it, with a superscript 2. This mode is selected by default when you set the terminal, but may be toggled afterward using "set termoption [no]enhanced", or by marking individual strings as in "set label 'x_2' noenhanced".
trans-unit.target: 许多终端类型都支持增强的文本模式，其中在文本字符串中嵌入了其他格式信息。例如，“ x ^ 2”将像上次看到的那样写x平方，并带有上标2。设置终端时默认选择此模式，但之后可以使用“ set termoption [no]”进行切换。增强”，或将单个字符串标记为“增强的设置标签'x_2'”。

trans-unit.source: Many terminals allow interaction with the current plot using the mouse. Some also support the definition of hotkeys to activate pre-defined functions by hitting a single key while the mouse focus is in the active plot window. It is even possible to combine mouse input with batch command scripts, by invoking the command pause mouse and then using the mouse variables returned by mouse clicking as parameters for subsequent scripted actions. See bind and mouse variables. See also the command set mouse.
trans-unit.target: 许多终端允许使用鼠标与当前图进行交互。有些还支持定义热键以通过在鼠标焦点位于活动绘图窗口中时按一个键来激活预定义功能。通过调用命令暂停鼠标，然后将通过单击鼠标返回的鼠标变量用作后续脚本操作的参数，甚至可以将鼠标输入与批处理命令脚本组合在一起。请参阅绑定和鼠标变量。另请参阅命令集mouse。

trans-unit.source: Many terminals support only discrete number of colors (e.g. 256 colors in gif). After the default gnuplot linetype colors are allocated, the rest of the available colors are by default reserved for pm3d. Thus a multiplot using multiple palettes could fail because the first palette has used all the available color positions. You can mitigate this limitation by using set palette maxcolors <N> with a reasonably small value of N. This option causes N discrete colors to be selected from a continuous palette sampled at equally spaced intervals. If you want unequal spacing of N discrete colors, use set palette defined instead of a single continuous palette.
trans-unit.target: 许多终端仅支持离散数量的颜色（例如gif中的256种颜色）。分配默认的gnuplot线型颜色后，默认情况下，其余可用颜色将保留给pm3d。因此，使用多个调色板的多图可能会失败，因为第一个调色板已使用了所有可用的颜色位置。您可以通过使用具有较小N值的设置调色板maxcolors <N>来减轻此限制。此选项导致从以等间距间隔采样的连续调色板中选择N个离散颜色。如果要使N种离散颜色的间距不相等，请使用已定义的设置调色板，而不要使用单个连续调色板。

trans-unit.source: Metapost Instructions

trans-unit.source: Metapost pictures are typically used in TeX documents. Metapost deals with fonts pretty much the same way TeX does, which is different from most other document preparation programs. If the picture is included in a LaTeX document using the graphics package, or in a plainTeX document via epsf.tex, and then converted to PostScript with dvips (or other dvi-to-ps converter), the text in the plot will usually be handled correctly. However, the text may not appear if you send the Metapost output as-is to a PostScript interpreter.
trans-unit.target: Metapost图片通常用于TeX文档中。Metapost处理字体的方式与TeX差不多,这与其他大多数文档编制程序不同。如果图片被包含在使用图形包的LaTeX文档中,或者通过epsf.tex包含在PlainTeX文档中,然后用dvips(或其他dvi-to-ps转换器)转换为PostScript,情节中的文本通常会被正确处理。但是,如果您将Metapost的输出原封不动地发送给PostScript解释器,文字可能不会出现。

trans-unit.source: NB: THIS SECTION IS LARGELY IRRELEVANT IN GNUPLOT VERSION 5 gnuplot honors the following resources for setting the width (in pixels) of plot lines (shown here with their default values.) 0 or 1 means a minimal width line of 1 pixel width. A value of 2 or 3 may improve the appearance of some plots.
trans-unit.target: NB：这部分基本上是无能为力的IN GNUPLOT VERSION 5 gnuplot的荣誉以下资源，用于设置的情节主线的宽度（以像素计）0或1表示1米像素宽度的最小宽度线（与它们的默认值在此示出）。值为2或3可能会改善某些图的外观。

trans-unit.source: NB: THIS SECTION IS LARGELY IRRELEVANT IN GNUPLOT VERSION 5 Choosing the appropriate visual class and number of colors is a crucial point in X11 applications and a bit awkward, since X11 supports six visual types in different depths.
trans-unit.target: 注意:在GNUPLOT版本5中,本节是非常重要的 选择合适的视觉类和颜色数量是X11应用中的一个关键点,而且有点尴尬,因为X11支持六种不同深度的视觉类型。

trans-unit.source: NB: THIS SECTION IS LARGELY IRRELEVANT IN GNUPLOT VERSION 5 The X11 terminal honors the following resources (shown here with their default values) or the greyscale resources. The values may be color names as listed in the X11 rgb.txt file on your system, hexadecimal RGB color specifications (see X11 documentation), or a color name followed by a comma and an intensity value from 0 to 1. For example, blue, 0.5 means a half intensity blue.
trans-unit.target: 注意：此部分在GNUPLOT版本5中大不相关。X11终端支持以下资源（此处以默认值显示）或灰度资源。值可以是系统上X11 rgb.txt文件中列出的颜色名称，十六进制RGB颜色规格（请参阅X11文档），或者是颜色名称后跟逗号和0至1 的强度值。例如，蓝色，0.5表示一半强度的蓝色。

trans-unit.source: NB: The deprecated option set pm3d hidden3d N is still accepted. It is equivalent to set pm3d border ls N.
trans-unit.target: 注意：不接受的选项集pm3d hidden3d N仍被接受。它相当于一套pm3d边境LSñ。

trans-unit.source: NOTES: This use of the $ character conflicts both with gnuplot's own syntax for datafile columns and with the use of $ to indicate environmental variables in a unix-like shell. The special sequence $# was mis-interpreted as a comment delimiter in gnuplot versions 4.5 through 4.6.3. Quote characters are ignored during substitution, so string constants are easily corrupted.
trans-unit.target: 注意：这种$字符的使用与gnuplot自己对数据文件列的语法以及$的使用（在类unix的外壳中）指示环境变量都存在冲突。在gnuplot版本4.5至4.6.3中，特殊序列$＃被误解为注释定界符。在替换期间，引号字符将被忽略，因此字符串常量很容易损坏。

trans-unit.target: 支持嵌套迭代。

trans-unit.source: New user-defined variables and functions of one through twelve variables may be declared and used anywhere, including on the plot command itself.
trans-unit.target: 可以在任何地方（包括在plot命令本身上）声明和使用新的用户定义变量和一到十二个变量的函数。

trans-unit.source: Newhistogram
trans-unit.target: Newhistogram

trans-unit.source: Newline ( \n) and enhanced text markup is accepted in the format string. Use double-quotes rather than single-quotes in this case. See also syntax. Characters not preceded by "%" are printed verbatim. Thus you can include spaces and labels in your format string, such as "%g m", which will put " m" after each number. If you want "%" itself, double it: "%g %%".
trans-unit.target: 格式字符串中接受换行符（\ n）和增强的文本标记。在这种情况下，请使用双引号而不是单引号。另请参见语法。不加“％”的字符逐字打印。因此，您可以在格式字符串中包含空格和标签，例如“％g m”，它将在每个数字后添加“ m”。如果您自己想要“％”，请将其加倍：“％g %%”。

trans-unit.source: Next comes the option trianglepattern <bitpattern>. <bitpattern> must be a number between 0 and 7, interpreted as a bit pattern. Each bit determines the visibility of one edge of the triangles each surface is split up into. Bit 0 is for the 'horizontal' edges of the grid, Bit 1 for the 'vertical' ones, and Bit 2 for the diagonals that split each cell of the original grid into two triangles. The default pattern is 3, making all horizontal and vertical lines visible, but not the diagonals. You may want to choose 7 to see those diagonals as well.
trans-unit.target: 接下来是选项trianglepattern <bitpattern>。<bitpattern>必须为0到7之间的数字，并解释为位模式。每一位确定每个表面拆分成的三角形的一个边缘的可见性。位0用于网格的“水平”边缘，位1用于“垂直”的边缘，位2用于将对角线（将原始网格的每个像元分成两个三角形）的对角线。默认模式为3，使所有水平和垂直线可见，但对角线不可见。您可能还需要选择7来查看那些对角线。

trans-unit.source: Noextend
trans-unit.target: Noextend

trans-unit.source: Non-numeric characters found in a numeric field will usually be interpreted as invalid rather than as a missing data point unless they happen to match the missing string.
trans-unit.target: 在数字字段中找到的非数字字符通常会被解释为无效，而不是缺少的数据点，除非它们恰好与丢失的字符串匹配。

trans-unit.source: Nonlinear
trans-unit.target: Nonlinear

trans-unit.source: Nonlinear fitting is not guaranteed to converge to the global optimum (the solution with the smallest sum of squared residuals, SSR), and can get stuck at a local minimum. The routine has no way to determine that; it is up to you to judge whether this has happened.
trans-unit.target: 非线性拟合不能保证收敛到全局最优值(具有最小平方残差和的解,SSR),可能会卡在局部最小值。例程没有办法确定这一点;由您来判断是否发生了这种情况。

trans-unit.source: Nonuniform
trans-unit.target: Nonuniform

trans-unit.source: Normally a line segment in a plot is not drawn if either end of the segment lies outside the plot boundaries (i.e. xrange and yrange). set clip one causes gnuplot to draw also the in-range portion of line segments with one endpoint out of range. set clip two causes gnuplot to draw also the in-range portion of line segments with both endpoints out of range. Line segments that lie entirely outside the plot boundaries are never drawn.
trans-unit.target: 通常，如果线段的任意一端不在绘图边界（即xrange和yrange）之外，则不会绘制该线段。设置片段一会导致gnuplot绘制线段的范围内的部分，而一个端点超出范围。设置两个片段会导致gnuplot也在两个端点都超出范围的情况下绘制线段的范围内部分。永远不会绘制完全位于绘图边界之外的线段。

trans-unit.source: Normally each plot autogenerates a single line entry in the key. If you need more control over what appears in the key you can use the keyentry keyword in the plot or splot command to insert extra lines. Instead of providing a filename or function to plot, use keyentry as a placeholder followed by plot style information (used to generate a key symbol) and a title. Example:
trans-unit.target: 通常，每个图都会在键中自动生成一条线条目。如果需要更多控制键中显示的内容，可以在plot或splot命令中使用keyentry关键字插入额外的行。与其提供要绘制的文件名或函数，不如使用keyentry作为占位符，后跟打印样式信息（用于生成键符号）和标题。例：

trans-unit.source: Normally hotkeys are only recognized when the currently active plot window has focus. bind allwindows <key> ... (short form: bind all <key> ...) causes the binding for <key> to apply to all gnuplot plot windows, active or not. In this case gnuplot variable MOUSE_KEY_WINDOW is set to the ID of the originating window, and may be used by the bound command.
trans-unit.target: 通常，仅当当前活动的绘图窗口具有焦点时才能识别热键。bind allwindows <key> ...（简称：bind all <key> ...）使<key>的绑定应用于所有gnuplot绘图窗口，无论激活与否。在这种情况下，将gnuplot变量MOUSE_KEY_WINDOW设置为原始窗口的ID，并且可以由绑定命令使用。

trans-unit.source: Normally if explicit tics are given, they are used instead of auto-generated tics. Conversely if you specify set xtics auto or the like it will erase any previously specified explicit tics. You can mix explicit and auto- generated tics by using the keyword add, which must appear before the tic style being added.
trans-unit.target: 通常，如果给出了显式tic，则使用它们代替自动生成的tic。相反，如果您指定set xtics auto或类似参数，它将删除任何先前指定的显式tic。您可以使用关键字add混合显式和自动生成的tic，它必须出现在添加tic样式之前。

trans-unit.source: Normally the enhanced text mode string interpretation, if enabled for the current terminal, is applied to all text strings including label text. The noenhanced property can be used to exempt a specific label from the enhanced text mode processing. The can be useful if the label contains underscores, for example. See enhanced text.
trans-unit.target: 通常，如果为当前终端启用了增强的文本模式字符串解释，则会将其应用于包括标签文本在内的所有文本字符串。所述noenhanced属性可用于免除从增强的文本模式处理的特定标签。例如，如果标签包含下划线，则可以很有用。请参阅增强文本。

trans-unit.source: Normally the margins of a plot are automatically calculated based on tics, tic labels, axis labels, the plot title, the timestamp and the size of the key if it is outside the borders. If, however, tics are attached to the axes (set xtics axis, for example), neither the tics themselves nor their labels will be included in either the margin calculation or the calculation of the positions of other text to be written in the margin. This can lead to tic labels overwriting other text if the axis is very close to the border.
trans-unit.target: 通常，图的边距是根据tic，tic标签，轴标签，图标题，时间戳和键的大小（如果它在边界之外）自动计算的。但是，如果将标记附加到轴（例如，设置xtics轴），则标记本身或它们的标签都不会包含在页边距计算或要在页边距中写入其他文本的位置的计算中。如果轴非常靠近边框，则这可能导致tic标签覆盖其他文本。

trans-unit.source: Not all terminals support the linewidth and pointsize features; if not supported, the option will be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 并非所有的终端都支持的线宽和的pointsize功能; 如果不支持，该选项将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Note also that the x value is held constant within each dataline. If you instead keep y constant, and plot with hidden-line removal enabled, you will find that the surface is drawn 'inside-out'.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,每条数据线的 x 值都是恒定的。如果您保持 y 值不变,并在启用隐藏线删除功能的情况下进行绘制,您会发现曲面是由内向外绘制的。

trans-unit.source: Note that "datafile.dat" defines a 4 by 3 grid ( 4 rows of 3 points each ). Rows (blocks) are separated by blank records.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,"datafile.dat "定义了一个4乘3的网格(4行,每行3点)。行(块)由空白记录分隔。

trans-unit.source: Note that fit, in common with most NLLS implementations, minimizes the weighted sum of squared distances (y-f(x))**2. It does not provide any means to account for "errors" in the values of x, only in y. Also, any "outliers" (data points outside the normal distribution of the model) will have an exaggerated effect on the solution.
trans-unit.target: 需要注意的是配合，与大多数NLLS实现常见的，最小化的平方距离（YF（X））** 2的加权和。它没有提供任何手段来解决x值中的“错误”，仅解决y中的问题。同样，任何“异常值”（模型正态分布之外的数据点）都会对解决方案产生夸大的影响。

trans-unit.source: Note that gnuplot quietly ignores undefined values, so the final branch of the function (1/0) will produce no plottable points. Note also that f(x) will be plotted as a continuous function across the discontinuity if a line style is used. To plot it discontinuously, create separate functions for the two pieces. (Parametric functions are also useful for this purpose.)
trans-unit.target: 请注意，gnuplot会静默忽略未定义的值，因此函数（1/0）的最后一个分支不会产生可绘制的点。还要注意，如果使用线型，则f（x）将绘制为不连续点上的连续函数。要不连续地绘制它，请为这两块创建单独的函数。（参数功能也可用于此目的。）

trans-unit.source: Note that reset does not necessarily return settings to the state they were in at program entry, because the default values may have been altered by commands in the initialization files gnuplotrc or $HOME/.gnuplot. However, these commands can be re-executed by using the variant command reset session.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，复位不一定会使设置返回到程序进入时的状态，因为默认值可能已由初始化文件gnuplotrc或$ HOME / .gnuplot中的命令更改。但是，可以通过使用variant命令重置会话来重新执行这些命令。

trans-unit.source: Note that set object ellipse size <2r>,<2r> does not in general produce the same result as set object circle <r>. The circle radius is always interpreted in terms of units along the x axis, and will always produce a circle even if the x and y axis scales are different and even if the aspect ratio of your plot is not 1. If units is set to xy, then 'set object ellipse' interprets the first <2r> in terms of x axis units and the second <2r> in terms of y axis units. This will only produce a circle if the x and y axis scales are identical and the plot aspect ratio is 1. On the other hand, if units is set to xx or yy, then the diameters specified in the 'set object' command will be interpreted in the same units, so the ellipse will have the correct aspect ratio, and it will maintain its aspect ratio even if the plot is resized.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，设置对象椭圆大小<2r>，<2r>通常不会产生与设置对象圆<r>相同的结果。圆半径始终以沿x轴的单位来解释，即使x和y轴的比例不同并且即使绘图的纵横比不为1，也始终会产生一个圆。如果单位设置为xy，然后“设置对象椭圆”以x轴单位解释第一个<2r>，并以y轴单位解释第二个<2r>。仅当x和y轴比例相同且绘图纵横比为1时，才会产生一个圆。另一方面，如果单位设置为xx或yy，则“设置对象”命令中指定的直径将以相同单位进行解释，因此椭圆将具有正确的宽高比，并且即使调整绘图大小也将保持其宽高比。

trans-unit.source: Note that yerror and xyerror are similar in both form and interpretation to the yerrorlines and xyerrorlines 2D plot styles.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，yerror和xyerror的形式和解释与yerrorlines和xyerrorlines 2D绘图样式相似。

trans-unit.source: Note that after a zoom by mouse, you can read the new ranges as GPVAL_X_MIN, GPVAL_X_MAX, GPVAL_Y_MIN, and GPVAL_Y_MAX, see gnuplot-defined variables.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，通过鼠标缩放后，您可以读取新范围，如GPVAL_X_MIN，GPVAL_X_MAX，GPVAL_Y_MIN和GPVAL_Y_MAX，请参阅gnuplot定义的变量。

trans-unit.source: Note that both the overlap criterion and the magnitude of jitter default to one character unit. Thus the plot appearance will change with the terminal font size, canvas size, or zoom factor. To avoid this you can specify the overlap criterion in the y axis coordinate system (the first keyword) and adjust the point size and spread multiplier as appropriate. See coordinates, pointsize, jitter.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，重叠标准和抖动幅度均默认为一个字符单位。因此，图形外观将随终端字体大小，画布大小或缩放系数而变化。为避免这种情况，您可以在y轴坐标系（第一个关键字）中指定重叠条件，并适当调整点大小和散布系数。见坐标，的pointsize，抖动。

trans-unit.source: Note that built-in support of some of these options is printer device dependent. For instance, all the fonts are supposedly supported by the HP Laserjet IV, but only a few (e.g. univers, stick) may be supported by the HP Laserjet III and the Designjet 750C. Also, color obviously won't work on the the laserjets since they are monochrome devices.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,其中一些选项的内置支持取决于打印机设备。例如,HP Laserjet IV应该支持所有的字体,但HP Laserjet III和Designjet 750C可能只支持少数字体(如univers、stick)。另外,彩色字体显然不能在Laserjet上使用,因为它们是单色设备。

trans-unit.source: Note that double quotes must be used. The same font will be used for both lines, of course.
trans-unit.target: 注意一定要用双引号。当然,两行的字体要一样。

trans-unit.source: Note that gnuplot uses both "real" and "integer" arithmetic, like FORTRAN and C. Integers are entered as "1", "-10", etc; reals as "1.0", "-10.0", "1e1", 3.5e-1, etc. The most important difference between the two forms is in division: division of integers truncates: 5/2 = 2; division of reals does not: 5.0/2.0 = 2.5. In mixed expressions, integers are "promoted" to reals before evaluation: 5/2e0 = 2.5. The result of division of a negative integer by a positive one may vary among compilers. Try a test like "print -5/2" to determine if your system always rounds down (-5/2 yields -3) or always rounds toward zero (-5/2 yields -2).
trans-unit.target: 需要注意的是,gnuplot和FORTRAN、C语言一样,使用 "实数 "和 "整数 "两种运算方式,整数输入为 "1"、"-10 "等;实数输入为 "1.0"、"-10.0"、"1e1"、3.5e-1等。两种形式最重要的区别在于除法:整数的除法截断。5/2=2;而除以实数则不会:5.0/2.0=2.5。在混合表达式中,整数在评价前被 "提升 "为实数。5/2e0=2.5.负整数除以正整数的结果可能在不同的编译器中有所不同。试试 "print -5/2 "这样的测试,以确定你的系统是否总是向下舍入(-5/2产生-3)或总是向零舍入(-5/2产生-2)。

trans-unit.source: Note that if you wish to store the current directory into a string variable or use it in string expressions, then you can use variable GPVAL_PWD, see show variables all.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果您希望将当前目录存储在字符串变量中或在字符串表达式中使用它，则可以使用变量GPVAL_PWD，请参见show variables all。

trans-unit.source: Note that in multiplot mode, replot can only reproduce the most recent component plot, not the full set.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，在多图模式下，replot只能再现最新的组件图，而不能再现完整的图。

trans-unit.source: Note that it is possible to find a set of the best matching rgbformulae for any other color scheme by the command
trans-unit.target: 需要注意的是,可以通过命令

trans-unit.source: Note that multikey-bindings with modifiers must be given in quotes.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,带修饰符的多键绑定必须用引号表示。

trans-unit.source: Note that no tic is placed at y=50000 because it is not in the series 2*10^x. If the logscale property is disabled, the tic increment will be treated as an additive constant even for a log-scaled axis. For example:

trans-unit.source: Note that records containing unplottable information are counted.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,含有不可复制信息的记录会被计算在内。

trans-unit.source: Note that strings in double-quotes are parsed differently than those enclosed in single-quotes. The major difference is that backslashes may need to be doubled when in double-quoted strings.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,双引号中的字符串与单引号中的字符串的解析方式不同。主要的区别是,当双引号字符串中的反斜杠可能需要加倍。

trans-unit.source: Note that the linewidth, pointsize and palette options are not supported by all terminals.
trans-unit.target: 需要注意的是线宽，的pointsize和调色板选项并非所有的终端支持。

trans-unit.source: Note that the order the parametric functions are specified is xfunction, yfunction (and zfunction) and that each operates over the common parametric domain.
trans-unit.target: 需要注意的是,参数函数的指定顺序是xfunction、yfunction(和zfunction),并且每个函数都在共同的参数域上运行。

trans-unit.source: Note that the two examples just given present exactly the same data values, but in different formats.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,刚才给出的两个例子呈现的数据值完全相同,但格式不同。

trans-unit.source: Note that the use of "\t", "\n", or "\f" requires use of double-quotes rather than single-quotes.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,使用 "t"、"/n "或"/f "需要使用双引号而不是单引号。

trans-unit.source: Note that the variables pi (3.14159...) and NaN (IEEE "Not a Number") are already defined. You can redefine these to something else if you really need to. The original values can be recovered by setting:
trans-unit.target: 请注意，变量pi（3.14159 ...）和NaN（IEEE“非数字”）已定义。如果确实需要，可以将它们重新定义为其他内容。可以通过以下方法恢复原始值：

trans-unit.source: Note that there may be additional limitations on the creation or viewing of graphs containing transparent fill areas. For example, the png terminal can only use transparent fill if the "truecolor" option is set. Some pdf viewers may not correctly display the fill areas even if they are correctly described in the pdf file. Ghostscript/gv does not correctly display pattern-fill areas even though actual PostScript printers generally have no problem.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,在创建或查看包含透明填充区域的图形时可能会有额外的限制。例如,png终端只有在设置了 "truecolor "选项时才能使用透明填充。一些pdf浏览器可能无法正确显示填充区域,即使它们在pdf文件中被正确描述。Ghostscript/gv不能正确显示图案填充区域,即使实际的PostScript打印机通常没有问题。

trans-unit.source: Note that this command is ignored when you are using any of the LaTeX terminals, as LaTeX has its own mechanism for handling minus signs. It also is not necessary when using the postscript terminal because the postscript prologue output by gnuplot remaps the ascii hyphen code \055 to a different glyph named minus.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，当您使用任何LaTeX终端时，此命令都会被忽略，因为LaTeX具有处理负号的自身机制。使用postscript终端时也没有必要，因为gnuplot输出的postscript序言会将ascii连字符代码\ 055重新映射到另一个名为minus的字形。

trans-unit.source: Note that this is a "geographic" spherical system, rather than a "polar" one (that is, phi is measured from the equator, rather than the pole).
trans-unit.target: 请注意,这是一个 "地理 "球面系统,而不是一个 "极地 "系统(也就是说,phi是从赤道而不是极点测量的)。

trans-unit.source: Note that when plotting several plots, they are plotted in the order given on the command line. This can be of interest especially for filled surfaces which can overwrite and therefore hide part of earlier plots.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,当绘制多张图时,它们是按照命令行中的顺序绘制的。这一点可能会引起人们的兴趣,特别是对于填充面,因为填充面可能会覆盖并因此掩盖之前的部分图形。

trans-unit.source: Note, however, that if a user-defined line style has been selected, its properties (type and width) cannot be altered merely by issuing another set style arrow command with the appropriate index and lt or lw.

trans-unit.source: Notes: Remember to escape the # character (or other chars meaningful to (La-)TeX) by \\ (2 backslashes). It seems that dashed lines become solid lines when the vertices of a plot are too close. (I do not know if that is a general problem with the tpic specials, or if it is caused by a bug in eepic.sty or dvips/dvipdfm.) The default size of an eepic plot is 5x3 inches. You can change this using the size terminal option. Points, among other things, are drawn using the LaTeX commands "\Diamond", "\Box", etc. These commands no longer belong to the LaTeX2e core; they are included in the latexsym package, which is part of the base distribution and thus part of any LaTeX implementation. Please do not forget to use this package. Instead of latexsym, you can also include the amssymb package. All drivers for LaTeX offer a special way of controlling text positioning: If any text string begins with '{', you also need to include a '}' at the end of the text, and the whole text will be centered both horizontally and vertically. If the text string begins with '[', you need to follow this with a position specification (up to two out of t,b,l,r), ']{', the text itself, and finally '}'. The text itself may be anything LaTeX can typeset as an LR-box. ' \rule{}{}'s may help for best positioning.
trans-unit.target: 注意：请记住用\\（2个反斜杠）转义＃字符（或其他对（La-）TeX有意义的字符）。当图的顶点太近时，虚线似乎变成实线。（我不知道这是tpic specials的普遍问题，还是由eepic.sty或dvips / dvipdfm中的错误引起。）eepic图的默认大小为5x3英寸。您可以使用尺寸更改终端选项。使用LaTeX命令“ \ Diamond”，“ \ Box”等绘制点。这些命令不再属于LaTeX2e内核；它们包含在latexsym软件包中，该软件包是基本发行版的一部分，因此也是任何LaTeX实现的一部分。请不要忘记使用此软件包。除了Latexsym，您还可以包括amssymb软件包。 LaTeX的所有驱动程序都提供了一种特殊的方式来控制文本位置：如果任何文本字符串以'{'开头，则还需要在文本末尾包含'}'，并且整个文本将在水平和垂直方向上居中。如果文本字符串以“ [”开头，则需要在其后加上位置说明（t，b，l，r中最多两个），“] {”，文本本身，最后是“}”。文本本身可以是LaTeX可以将其排版为LR-box的任何内容。 '\ rule {} {}'s可能有助于最佳定位。

trans-unit.source: Notice that ARG1 must be dereferenced as a macro, but ARG2 may be dereferenced either as a macro (yielding a numerical constant) or a variable (yielding that same numerical value after auto-promotion of the string "1.23" to a real).
trans-unit.target: 请注意,ARG1必须作为宏引用,但ARG2可以作为宏引用(产生一个数值常数)或变量(在将字符串 "1.23 "自动推广为实数后产生相同的数值)。

trans-unit.source: Notice that ranges of z-values and color-values for surfaces are adjustable independently by set zrange, set cbrange, as well as set log for z or cb. Maps can be adjusted by the cb-axis only; see also set view map and set colorbox.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，可以通过设置zrange，set cbrange和z或cb的log来独立调整曲面的z值和颜色值的范围。只能通过cb轴调整地图；另请参阅设置视图图和设置colorbox。

trans-unit.source: Numerical formats may be preceded by a "0" ("zero") to pad the field with leading zeroes, and preceded by a positive digit to define the minimum field width. The %S, and %t formats also accept a precision specifier so that fractional hours/minutes/seconds can be written.
trans-unit.target: 数字格式可以用 "0"("零")作为前导零垫在字段前,用正数定义最小字段宽度。%S和%t格式也可以接受一个精度指定符,这样就可以写入小数小时/分钟/秒。

trans-unit.source: Object specifications in 3D plots cannot use graph coordinates. Rectangles and ellipses in 3D plots are limited to screen coordinates.

trans-unit.source: Of course finding a nice-looking fit does not prove there is no "better" fit (in either a statistical sense, characterized by an improved goodness-of-fit criterion, or a physical sense, with a solution more consistent with the model.) Depending on the problem, it may be desirable to fit with various sets of starting values, covering a reasonable range for each parameter.
trans-unit.target: 当然，找到一个看起来不错的拟合并不能证明没有“更好的”拟合（从统计学的角度（以改进的拟合优度标准为特征，或者从物理的角度来看），其解决方案与模型更一致。 ）根据问题，可能需要适合各种初始值集，并覆盖每个参数的合理范围。

trans-unit.source: Offsets
trans-unit.target: Offsets

trans-unit.source: Offsets provide a mechanism to put an empty boundary around the data inside an autoscaled graph. The offsets only affect the x1 and y1 axes, and only in 2D plot commands.
trans-unit.target: 偏移量提供了一种在自动缩放的图形内的数据周围放置空白边界的机制。偏移仅影响x1和y1轴，并且仅在2D 绘图命令中。

trans-unit.source: Often the endianess of binary data in the file does not agree with the endianess used by the platform on which gnuplot is running. Several words can direct gnuplot how to arrange bytes. For example endian=little means treat the binary file as having byte significance from least to greatest. The options are
trans-unit.target: 通常，文件中二进制数据的字节序与运行gnuplot的平台所使用的字节序不一致。几个词可以指导gnuplot如何安排字节。例如，endian = little意味着将二进制文件视为字节重要性从最小到最大。选项是

trans-unit.source: Often the function to be fitted will be based on a model (or theory) that attempts to describe or predict the behaviour of the data. Then fit can be used to find values for the free parameters of the model, to determine how well the data fits the model, and to estimate an error range for each parameter. See fit error_estimates.
trans-unit.target: 通常，要拟合的功能将基于试图描述或预测数据行为的模型（或理论）。然后可以使用拟合来查找模型的自由参数的值，确定数据对模型的拟合程度，并估计每个参数的误差范围。请参阅fit error_estimates。

trans-unit.source: Old gnuplot versions handled NaN differently depending of the form of the using clause, as shown in plots (c) and (d). Gnuplot now handles NaN the same whether the input column was specified as N or ($N). See also the imageNaN demo.
trans-unit.target: 如曲线（c）和（d）所示，旧的gnuplot版本根据using子句的形式对NaN的处理方式有所不同。现在，无论输入列是指定为N还是（$ N），Gnuplot都将以相同的方式处理NaN。另请参见imageNaN演示。

trans-unit.source: On MSDOS machines, set output "PRN" will direct the output to the default printer. On VMS, output can be sent directly to any spooled device.

trans-unit.source: On Unix, HOME is used as the name of a directory to search for a .gnuplot file if none is found in the current directory. On MS-DOS, Windows and OS/2, GNUPLOT is used. On Windows, the NT-specific variable USERPROFILE is also tried. VMS, SYS$LOGIN: is used. Type help startup.
trans-unit.target: 在Unix上，如果在当前目录中找不到.gnuplot文件，则将HOME用作目录名称来搜索.gnuplot文件。在MS-DOS，Windows和OS / 2上，使用GNUPLOT。在Windows上，还会尝试NT特定的变量USERPROFILE。VMS，使用SYS $ LOGIN ：。键入帮助启动。

trans-unit.source: On Unix, PAGER is used as an output filter for help messages.
trans-unit.target: 在Unix上,PAGER被用作帮助信息的输出过滤器。

trans-unit.source: On Unix, SHELL is used for the shell command. On MS-DOS and OS/2, COMSPEC is used for the shell command.
trans-unit.target: 在Unix上，SHELL用于shell命令。在MS-DOS和OS / 2上，COMSPEC用于shell命令。

trans-unit.source: On VMS, the logical name GNUPLOT$HELP should be defined as the name of the help library for gnuplot. The gnuplot help can be put inside any VMS system help library.
trans-unit.target: 在VMS上，应将逻辑名GNUPLOT $ HELP定义为gnuplot的帮助库的名称。该gnuplot的帮助，可以在任何VMS系统帮助库里面放。

trans-unit.source: On a typical Unix machine there will usually be a script called "mf" that executes virmf '&plain', so you probably can substitute mf for virmf &plain. This will generate two files: mfput.tfm and mfput.$$$gf (where $$$ indicates the resolution of your device). The above can be conveniently achieved by typing everything on the command line, e.g.: virmf '&plain' ' \mode:=CanonCX; mag:=1; input myfigures.mf' In this case the output files will be named myfigures.tfm and myfigures.300gf.
trans-unit.target: 在典型的Unix机器上，通常会有一个名为“ mf”的脚本来执行virmf'＆plain'，因此您可以用mf代替virmf＆plain。这将生成两个文件：mfput.tfm和mfput。$$$ gf（其中$$$表示设备的分辨率）。可以通过在命令行上键入所有内容来方便地实现上述功能，例如：virmf'＆plain''\ mode：= CanonCX; mag：= 1;输入myfigures.mf”，在这种情况下，输出文件将命名为myfigures.tfm和myfigures.300gf。

trans-unit.source: On gnuplot start-up, the mode is explicit. For historical and compatibility reasons, the commands set pm3d; (i.e. no options) and set pm3d at X ... (i.e. at is the first option) change the mode to implicit. The command set pm3d; sets other options to their default state.
trans-unit.target: 在gnuplot启动时，该模式是显式的。出于历史和兼容性的原因，命令设置为pm3d;。（即没有选项），并将pm3d设置为X ...（即，第一个选项为），将模式更改为隐式。该命令设置为pm3d;将其他选项设置为默认状态。

trans-unit.source: On most systems libgd also provides access to Adobe Type 1 fonts (*.pfa) and TrueType fonts (*.ttf). You must give the name of the font file, not the name of the font inside it, in the form "<face> {,<pointsize>}". <face> is either the full pathname to the font file, or the first part of a filename in one of the directories listed in the GDFONTPATH environmental variable. That is, 'set term png font "Face"' will look for a font file named either <somedirectory>/Face.ttf or <somedirectory>/Face.pfa. For example, if GDFONTPATH contains /usr/local/fonts/ttf:/usr/local/fonts/pfa then the following pairs of commands are equivalent

trans-unit.source: Once fit has finished, the save fit command may be used to store final values in a file for subsequent use as a parameter file. See save fit for details.

trans-unit.source: Options: You can give options in any order you wish. 'color' causes gnuplot to produce \color{...} commands so that the graphs are colored. Using this option, you must include \usepackage{color} in the preamble of your latex document. 'dashed' will allow dashed line types; without this option, only solid lines with varying thickness will be used. 'dashed' and 'color' are mutually exclusive; if 'color' is specified, then 'dashed' will be ignored. 'rotate' will enable true rotated text (by 90 degrees). Otherwise, rotated text will be typeset with letters stacked above each other. If you use this option you must include \usepackage{graphicx} in the preamble. 'small' will use \scriptsize symbols as point markers (Probably does not work with TeX, only LaTeX2e). Default is to use the default math size. 'tiny' uses \scriptscriptstyle symbols. 'default' resets all options to their defaults = no color, no dashed lines, pseudo-rotated (stacked) text, large point symbols. <fontsize> is a number which specifies the font size inside the picture environment; the unit is pt (points), i.e., 10 pt equals approx. 3.5 mm. If fontsize is not specified, then all text inside the picture will be set in \footnotesize.
trans-unit.target: 选项：您可以按希望的任何顺序提供选项。 'color'使gnuplot产生\ color {...}命令，使图形着色。使用此选项，您必须在乳胶文档的序言中包含\ usepackage {color}。 “虚线”将允许使用虚线类型；如果没有此选项，将仅使用厚度变化的实线。 “虚线”和“颜色”是互斥的；如果指定了“颜色”，则“虚线”将被忽略。 “旋转”将启用真正的旋转文本（旋转90度）。否则，将使用彼此堆叠的字母来排版旋转文本。如果使用此选项，则必须在序言中包含\ usepackage {graphicx}。 'small'将使用\ scriptsize符号作为点标记（可能不适用于TeX，仅适用于LaTeX2e）。默认值是使用默认的数学大小。 'tiny'使用\ scriptscriptstyle符号。 'default'将所有选项重置为其默认值=无颜色，无虚线，伪旋转（堆叠）文本，大点符号。 <fontsize>是一个数字，它指定图片环境中的字体大小；单位是pt（点），即10 pt等于大约。 3.5毫米如果未指定fontsize，则图片内的所有文本都将设置为\ footnotesize。那么图片中的所有文本都将设置为\ footnotesize。那么图片中的所有文本都将设置为\ footnotesize。

trans-unit.source: Other acceptable modifiers (which come after the "%" but before the format specifier) are "-", which left-justifies the number; "+", which forces all numbers to be explicitly signed; "" (a space), which makes positive numbers have a space in front of them where negative numbers have "-"; "#", which places a decimal point after floats that have only zeroes following the decimal point; a positive integer, which defines the field width; "0" (the digit, not the letter) immediately preceding the field width, which indicates that leading zeroes are to be used instead of leading blanks; and a decimal point followed by a non-negative integer, which defines the precision (the minimum number of digits of an integer, or the number of digits following the decimal point of a float).
trans-unit.target: 其他可接受的修饰符(出现在"%"之后,但在格式指定符之前)是"-",它使数字左对齐;"+",它迫使所有的数字显式签名;""(空格),它使正数前面有一个空格,而负数有"-";"#",它将小数点放在浮点数之后,而小数点后面只有零。一个正整数,它定义了字段宽度;"0"(数字,不是字母)紧接在字段宽度之前,它表示要使用前导零而不是前导空;一个小数点后跟一个非负整数,它定义了精度(整数的最小位数,或浮点数的小数点后的位数)。

trans-unit.source: Other characteristics of the arrow can either be specified as a pre-defined arrow style or by providing them in set arrow command. For a detailed explanation of arrow characteristics, see arrowstyle.

trans-unit.source: PNG, JPEG and GIF images are created using the external library libgd. In most cases, PNG is to be preferred for single plots, and GIF for animations. Both are loss-less image formats, and produce better image quality than the lossy JPEG format. This is in particular noticeable for solid color lines against a solid background, i.e. exactly the sort of image typically created by gnuplot.
trans-unit.target: PNG、JPEG 和 GIF 图像是使用外部库 libgd 创建的。在大多数情况下,单个图块首选PNG,动画首选GIF。这两种格式都是无损失的图像格式,并且比有损失的JPEG格式产生更好的图像质量。这一点对于纯色线条与纯色背景的对比尤其明显,也就是典型的由gnuplot创建的图像。

trans-unit.source: Pango may give unexpected results with fonts that do not respect the unicode mapping. With the Symbol font, for example, the pdfcairo terminal will use the map provided by http://www.unicode.org/ to translate character codes to unicode. Note that "the Symbol font" is to be understood as the Adobe Symbol font, distributed with Acrobat Reader as "SY______.PFB". Alternatively, the OpenSymbol font, distributed with OpenOffice.org as "opens___.ttf", offers the same characters. Microsoft has distributed a Symbol font ("symbol.ttf"), but it has a different character set with several missing or moved mathematic characters. If you experience problems with your default setup (if the demo enhancedtext.dem is not displayed properly for example), you probably have to install one of the Adobe or OpenOffice Symbol fonts, and remove the Microsoft one. Other non-conform fonts, such as "wingdings" have been observed working.
trans-unit.target: 对于不尊重unicode映射的字体,Pango可能会产生意想不到的结果。例如,对于Symbol字体,pdfcairo终端将使用http://www.unicode.org/提供的映射来将字符代码翻译成unicode。请注意,"Symbol字体 "应理解为AdobeSymbol字体,它与Acrobat Reader一起作为 "SY______.PFB "分发。另外,OpenOffice.org分发的OpenSymbol字体作为 "opens___.ttf",也提供了相同的字符。微软发布了一个Symbol字体("symbol.ttf"),但它有一个不同的字符集,有几个缺失或移动的数学字符。如果你在默认设置中遇到问题(例如,如果演示增强的text.dem不能正确显示),你可能必须安装Adobe或OpenOffice Symbol字体之一,并删除微软的字体。其他不符合标准的字体,如 "wingdings "已经被观察到可以工作。

With the Symbol font, for example, the pngcairo terminal will use the map provided by http://www.unicode.org/ to translate character codes to unicode. Alternatively, the OpenSymbol font, distributed with OpenOffice.org as "opens___.ttf", offers the same characters. If you experience problems with your default setup (if the demo enhancedtext.dem is not displayed properly for example), you probably have to install one of the Adobe or OpenOffice Symbol fonts, and remove the Microsoft one.

trans-unit.source: Pango may give unexpected results with fonts that do not respect the unicode mapping. With the Symbol font, for example, the wxt terminal will use the map provided by http://www.unicode.org/ to translate character codes to unicode. Pango will do its best to find a font containing this character, looking for your Symbol font, or other fonts with a broad unicode coverage, like the DejaVu fonts. Note that "the Symbol font" is to be understood as the Adobe Symbol font, distributed with Acrobat Reader as "SY______.PFB". Alternatively, the OpenSymbol font, distributed with OpenOffice.org as "opens___.ttf", offers the same characters. Microsoft has distributed a Symbol font ("symbol.ttf"), but it has a different character set with several missing or moved mathematic characters. If you experience problems with your default setup (if the demo enhancedtext.dem is not displayed properly for example), you probably have to install one of the Adobe or OpenOffice Symbol fonts, and remove the Microsoft one. Other non-conform fonts, such as "wingdings" have been observed working.
trans-unit.target: 对于不尊重unicode映射的字体,Pango可能会给出意想不到的结果。例如,对于Symbol字体,wxt终端将使用http://www.unicode.org/提供的映射来将字符代码翻译成unicode。Pango会尽力寻找包含这个字符的字体,寻找你的Symbol字体,或者其他覆盖面广的unicode字体,比如DejaVu字体。请注意,"Symbol字体 "应理解为Adobe Symbol字体,随Acrobat Reader分发的是 "SY______.PFB"。另外,OpenOffice.org分发的OpenSymbol字体作为 "opens___.ttf",也提供了相同的字符。微软发布了一个Symbol字体("symbol.ttf"),但它有一个不同的字符集,有几个缺失或移动的数学字符。如果你在默认设置中遇到问题(例如,如果演示增强的text.dem不能正确显示),你可能必须安装Adobe或OpenOffice Symbol字体之一,并删除微软的字体。其他不符合标准的字体,如 "wingdings "已经被观察到可以工作。

trans-unit.source: Pango, the library used to layout the text, is based on utf-8. Thus, the pdfcairo terminal has to convert from your encoding to utf-8. The default input encoding is based on your 'locale'. If you want to use another encoding, make sure gnuplot knows which one you are using. See encoding for more details.
trans-unit.target: Pango（用于布局文本的库）基于utf-8。因此，pdfcairo终端必须将您的编码转换为utf-8。默认输入编码基于您的“语言环境”。如果要使用另一种编码，请确保gnuplot知道您正在使用哪种编码。有关更多详细信息，请参见编码。

trans-unit.source: Parallel axis plots can highlight correlation in a multidimensional data set. Each input column is associated with a separately scaled vertical axis. The column values read from each line of input are connected by line segments drawn from axis 1 to axis 2 to axis 3 and so on. That is, each line of input is represented by a separate line in the parallel axes plot. It is common to use some discrete categorization to assign line colors, allowing visual exploration of the correlation between this categorization and the axis dimensions. By default gnuplot will automatically determine the range and scale of the individual axes from the input data, but the usual set axis range commands can be used to customize this. See set paxis.
trans-unit.target: 平行轴图可以突出显示多维数据集中的相关性。每个输入列与单独缩放的垂直轴关联。从输入的每一行读取的列值由从轴1到轴2到轴3绘制的线段连接，依此类推。也就是说，输入的每条线在平行轴图中均由单独的线表示。通常使用一些离散的分类来分配线条颜色，从而可以直观地探索该分类与轴尺寸之间的相关性。默认情况下，gnuplot将根据输入数据自动确定各个轴的范围和比例，但是可以使用通常的set axis range命令对其进行自定义。请参阅设置轴。

trans-unit.source: Path names may be entered as single directory names, or as a list of path names separated by a platform-specific path separator, eg. colon (':') on Unix, semicolon (';') on DOS/Windows/OS/2 platforms. The show fontpath, save and save set commands replace the platform-specific separator with a space character (' ') for maximum portability. If a directory name ends with an exclamation mark ('!') also the subdirectories of this directory are searched for font files.

trans-unit.source: Pdf files can be made from the eps file using 'epstopdf'. If the graphics package is properly configured, the LaTeX files can also be processed by pdflatex without changes, using the pdf files instead of the eps files. The behaviour concerning font selection depends on the header mode. In all cases, the given font size is used for the calculation of proper spacing. When not using the standalone mode the actual LaTeX font and font size at the point of inclusion is taken, so use LaTeX commands for changing fonts. If you use e.g. 12pt as font size for your LaTeX document, use '"" 12' as options. The font name is ignored. If using standalone the given font and font size are used, see below for a detailed description.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用“ epstopdf”从eps文件制作pdf文件。如果正确配置了图形程序包，则使用pdf文件而不是eps文件，也可以由pdflatex处理LaTeX文件而不进行任何更改。有关字体选择的行为取决于标题模式。在所有情况下，给定的字体大小都用于计算适当的间距。不使用独立模式时，将采用包含点的实际LaTeX字体和字体大小，因此请使用LaTeX命令更改字体。如果您使用例如12pt作为LaTeX文档的字体大小，请使用““” 12“作为选项。字体名称将被忽略。如果单独使用给定的字体和字体大小，请参见下面的详细说明。

trans-unit.source: Placement of the key for 3D plots (splot) by default uses the fixed option. Note that this is a change from earlier gnuplot versions. fixed placement is very similar to inside placement with one important difference. The plot boundaries of a 3D plot change as the view point is rotated or scaled. If the key is positioned inside these boundaries then the key also moves when the view is changed. fixed positioning ignores changes to the view angles or scaling; i.e. the key remains fixed in one location on the canvas as the plot is rotated.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，用于3D图（splot）的键的位置使用fixed选项。请注意，这是对早期gnuplot版本的更改。固定放置与内部放置非常相似，但有一个重要区别。 3D图的图边界随着视点旋转或缩放而变化。如果关键点位于这些边界内，则更改视图时关键点也会移动。固定位置忽略了视角或缩放比例的变化；即，随着绘图旋转，关键点将固定在画布上的一个位置。

trans-unit.source: Plot windows remain open even when the gnuplot driver is changed to a different device. A plot window can be closed by pressing the letter q while that window has input focus, or by choosing close from a window manager menu. All plot windows can be closed by specifying reset, which actually terminates the subprocess which maintains the windows (unless -persist was specified).
trans-unit.target: 即使将gnuplot驱动程序更改为其他设备，绘图窗口仍保持打开状态。可以通过在窗口具有输入焦点时按字母q或从窗口管理器菜单中选择关闭来关闭绘图窗口。可以通过指定reset来关闭所有绘图窗口，该命令实际上终止维护窗口的子进程（除非指定了-persist）。

trans-unit.source: Plot windows remain open even when the gnuplot driver is changed to a different device. A plot window can be closed by pressing the letter q while that window has input focus, or by choosing close from a window manager menu. All plot windows can be closed by specifying reset, which actually terminates the subprocess which maintains the windows (unless -persist was specified). The close command can be used to close individual plot windows by number. However, after a reset, those plot windows left due to persist cannot be closed with the command close. A close without a number closes the current active plot window.
trans-unit.target: 即使将gnuplot驱动程序更改为其他设备，绘图窗口仍保持打开状态。可以通过在窗口具有输入焦点时按字母q或从窗口管理器菜单中选择关闭来关闭绘图窗口。通过指定reset可以关闭所有绘图窗口，该命令实际上终止维护窗口的子进程（除非指定了-persist）。该关闭命令可以用来通过多单至收盘各描绘窗口。但是，重置后，由于持久性而留下的那些绘图窗口无法使用命令close关闭。一个接近无号关闭当前活动绘图窗口。

trans-unit.source: Plot windows will automatically be closed at the end of the session unless the -persist option was given.
trans-unit.target: 除非指定-persist选项，否则在会话结束时将自动关闭绘图窗口。

trans-unit.source: Qualitatively, the absolute magnitude of the weights determines the number of segments used to construct the curve. If the weights are large, the effect of each datum is large and the curve approaches that produced by connecting consecutive points with natural cubic splines. If the weights are small, the curve is composed of fewer segments and thus is smoother; the limiting case is the single segment produced by a weighted linear least squares fit to all the data. The smoothing weight can be expressed in terms of errors as a statistical weight for a point divided by a "smoothing factor" for the curve so that (standard) errors in the file can be used as smoothing weights.
trans-unit.target: 从质量上看,权重的绝对大小决定了用于构建曲线的段数。如果权重大,每个基准点的影响就大,曲线就接近于用自然立方花键连接连续点产生的曲线。如果权重小,曲线由较少的段组成,因此比较平滑;极限情况是对所有数据进行加权线性最小二乘法拟合产生的单段。平滑权重可以用误差来表示,即一个点的统计权重除以曲线的 "平滑系数",这样文件中的(标准)误差就可以作为平滑权重。

trans-unit.source: Rather than determine confidence intervals, fit reports parameter error estimates which are readily obtained from the variance-covariance matrix after the final iteration. By convention, these estimates are called "standard errors" or "asymptotic standard errors", since they are calculated in the same way as the standard errors (standard deviation of each parameter) of a linear least-squares problem, even though the statistical conditions for designating the quantity calculated to be a standard deviation are not generally valid for the NLLS problem. The asymptotic standard errors are generally over-optimistic and should not be used for determining confidence levels, but are useful for qualitative purposes.
trans-unit.target: 拟合而不是确定置信区间，而是报告参数误差估计值，这些估计值可以在最终迭代后从方差-协方差矩阵轻松获得。按照惯例，这些估计被称为“标准误差”或“渐近标准误差”，因为它们的计算方式与线性最小二乘问题的标准误差（每个参数的标准偏差）相同，即使统计条件用于指定计算为标准偏差的数量通常不适用于NLLS问题。渐近标准误差通常过分乐观，不应用于确定置信度，但对于定性目的很有用。

trans-unit.source: Selecting monochrome mode does not prevent you from explicitly drawing lines using RGB or palette colors, but see also set palette gray. Six monochrome linetypes are defined by default. You can change their properties or add additional monochrome linetypes by using the full form of the command. Changes made to the monochrome linetypes do not affect the color linetypes and vice versa. To restore the usual set of color linetypes, use either unset monochrome or set color.

trans-unit.source: Setting front will draw the object in front of all plot elements, but behind any labels that are also marked front. Setting back will place the object behind all plot curves and labels. Setting behind will place the object behind everything including the axes and back rectangles, thus
trans-unit.target: 设置为front会将对象绘制在所有绘图元素的前面，但也将标记为front的所有标签后面。设置回将会把所有的情节曲线和标签背后的对象。设置在后面会将对象放置在所有内容（包括轴和后矩形）的后面，因此

trans-unit.source: Setting the interval to a negative value means that the label appear only once per contour line. However if set samples or set isosamples is large then many contour lines may be created, each with a single label.

trans-unit.source: Settings of the fit command are controlled by set fit. The old gnuplot user variables are deprecated as of version 5, see fit control variables.

trans-unit.source: Several algorithms are available to calculate the approximation from the raw data. Some of these algorithms can take additional parameters. These interpolations are such the closer the data point is to a grid point, the more effect it has on that grid point.
trans-unit.target: 有几种算法可用来计算原始数据的近似值。其中一些算法可以采取额外的参数。这些插值是这样的,数据点离网格点越近,对该网格点的影响越大。

trans-unit.source: Several gnuplot terminal drivers access TrueType fonts via the gd library. For these drivers the font search path is controlled by the environmental variable GDFONTPATH. Furthermore, a default font for these drivers may be set via the environmental variable GNUPLOT_DEFAULT_GDFONT.
trans-unit.target: 一些gnuplot终端驱动程序通过gd库访问TrueType字体,对于这些驱动程序,字体搜索路径由环境变量GDFONTPATH控制。对于这些驱动程序,字体搜索路径由环境变量GDFONTPATH控制。此外,这些驱动程序的默认字体可以通过环境变量GNUPLOT_DEFAULT_GDFONT来设置。

trans-unit.source: Several possibly useful files about gnuplot's PostScript are included in the /docs/psdoc subdirectory of the gnuplot distribution and at the distribution sites. These are "ps_symbols.gpi" (a gnuplot command file that, when executed, creates the file "ps_symbols.ps" which shows all the symbols available through the postscript terminal), "ps_guide.ps" (a PostScript file that contains a summary of the enhanced syntax and a page showing what the octal codes produce with text and symbol fonts), "ps_file.doc" (a text file that contains a discussion of the organization of a PostScript file written by gnuplot), and "ps_fontfile_doc.tex" (a LaTeX file which contains a short documentation concerning the encapsulation of LaTeX fonts with a glyph table of the math fonts).
trans-unit.target: gnuplot发行版的/ docs / psdoc子目录中以及发行网站上都包含一些有关gnuplot的PostScript的有用文件。这些是“ ps_symbols.gpi”（一个gnuplot命令文件，执行后会创建该文件“ ps_symbols.ps”，其中显示了可通过postscript终端使用的所有符号），“ ps_guide.ps”（一个包含摘要的PostScript文件）语法的增强和显示八进制代码使用文本和符号字体产生的内容的页面），“ ps_file.doc”（一个文本文件，其中讨论了由gnuplot编写的PostScript文件的组织）和“ ps_fontfile_doc.tex”（一个LaTeX文件，其中包含有关使用数学字体的字形表封装LaTeX字体的简短文档）。

trans-unit.source: Similar script files can be used to define theme-based color choices, or sets of colors optimized for a particular plot type or output device.
trans-unit.target: 类似的脚本文件可用于定义基于主题的颜色选择,或为特定的情节类型或输出设备优化的颜色集。

trans-unit.source: Similar to origin, this keyword will position the array such that its center lies at the point given by the tuple. For example, center=(0,0). Center does not apply when the size of the array is Inf.
trans-unit.target: 与origin类似，此关键字将对数组进行定位，使其中心位于元组给定的点。例如，center =（0,0）。当数组的大小为Inf时，Center不适用。

trans-unit.source: Similarly gnuplot now notices the missing value flag in column N whether the plot command specifies using N or using ($N) or using (func($N)). However if the "missing" value is encountered during evaluation of some more complicated expression, e.g. using (column(strcol(1)), it may evaluate to NaN and be treated as invalid data rather than as a missing data point. If you nevertheless want to treat this as missing data, use the command set datafile missing NaN.
trans-unit.target: 相似地，无论plot命令指定使用N还是使用（$ N）或使用（func（$ N））， gnuplot现在都会注意到N列中的缺失值标志。但是，如果在评估一些更复杂的表达式（例如，使用（column（strcol（1）））时遇到“缺失”值，则它可能会评估为NaN并被视为无效数据而不是缺失数据点。要将其视为丢失的数据，请使用命令set datafile missing NaN。

trans-unit.source: Similarly you can force the next histogram to begin with a specified fillstyle. If the fillstyle is set to pattern, then the pattern used for filling will be incremented automatically.
trans-unit.target: 同样，您可以强制下一个直方图以指定的fillstyle开头。如果fillstyle设置为pattern，则用于填充的图案将自动增加。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, a reduced chisquare less than 1.0 indicates WSSR is less than that expected for a random sample from the function with normally distributed errors. The data error estimates may be too large, the statistical assumptions may not be justified, or the model function may be too general, fitting fluctuations in a particular sample in addition to the underlying trends. In the latter case, a simpler function may be more appropriate.
trans-unit.target: 同样,小于1.0的降低的chisquare表示WSSR小于正态分布误差函数的随机样本的预期值。数据误差估计可能太大,统计假设可能不合理,或者模型函数可能太过笼统,除了基本趋势外,还拟合了特定样本的波动。在后一种情况下,一个更简单的函数可能更合适。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, the keyword nocontours will turn off contouring for an individual plot even if the global property set contour is active.
trans-unit.target: 同样，即使全局属性设置轮廓处于活动状态，关键字nocontours也会关闭单个图的轮廓。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, the keyword nosurface will turn off the 3D surface for an individual plot even if the global property set surface is active.
trans-unit.target: 同样，即使全局属性设置表面处于活动状态，关键字nosurface也会为单个图关闭3D表面。

trans-unit.source: Since integers are promoted to strings when operated on by the string concatenation operator ('.' character), the following method also works:
trans-unit.target: 由于整数被字符串连接运算符('.'字符)操作时,可以提升为字符串,所以下面的方法也可以使用。

trans-unit.source: Single blank records designate discontinuities in a plot; no line will join points separated by a blank records (if they are plotted with a line style).
trans-unit.target: 单空白记录在候不连续的情节 ; 没有线将连接由空白记录分隔的点（如果使用线型绘制）。

trans-unit.source: Single blank records separate blocks of data in a splot datafile; splot treats blocks as the equivalent of function y-isolines. No line will join points separated by a blank record. If all blocks contain the same number of points, gnuplot will draw cross-isolines between points in the blocks, connecting corresponding points. This is termed "grid data", and is required for drawing a surface, for contouring (set contour) and hidden-line removal (set hidden3d). See also splot grid_data.
trans-unit.target: 单个坯料记录在数据的独立的块splot数据文件; splot将块视为功能y-等值线的等价物。没有行将连接由空白记录分隔的点。如果所有块都包含相同数量的点，则gnuplot将在块中的点之间绘制交叉等值线，连接相应的点。这被称为“网格数据”，并且在绘制表面，轮廓（设置轮廓）和隐藏线移除（设置hidden3d）时是必需的。另请参见splot grid_data。

trans-unit.target: 一些漂亮的RGB色彩空间方案

trans-unit.source: Some prescriptions for analysing data, given in practical experimentation courses, may have you first fit some functions to your data, perhaps in a multi-step process of accounting for several aspects of the underlying theory one by one, and then extract the information you really wanted from the fitting parameters of those functions. With fit, this may often be done in one step by writing the model function directly in terms of the desired parameters. Transforming data can also quite often be avoided, though sometimes at the cost of a more difficult fit problem. If you think this contradicts the previous paragraph about simplifying the fit function, you are correct.
trans-unit.target: 在实践实验课程中提供了一些分析数据的处方，可能使您首先使数据适应某些功能，也许是在一步一步地解释基础理论的各个方面的过程中，然后才真正提取出信息。想要从这些函数的拟合参数中获取。使用fit时，通常可以通过直接根据所需参数编写模型函数来一步完成。通常也可以避免转换数据，尽管有时以更困难的拟合问题为代价。如果您认为这与简化拟合函数的上一段矛盾，那么您是正确的。

trans-unit.source: Some systems may not support all of these modifiers but may also support others; in case of doubt, check the appropriate documentation and then experiment.
trans-unit.target: 有些系统可能不支持所有这些修饰符,但也可能支持其他修饰符;如有疑问,请查看相应的文档,然后进行实验。

trans-unit.source: Some systems support multiple (different) visual classes together on one screen. On these systems it might be necessary to force gnuplot to use a specific visual class, e.g. the default visual might be 8bit PseudoColor but the screen would also support 24bit TrueColor which would be the preferred choice.
trans-unit.target: 有些系统支持在一个屏幕上同时显示多个(不同的)视觉类。在这些系统中,可能需要强制gnuplot使用特定的视觉类,例如,默认的视觉类可能是8位PseudoColor,但屏幕也支持24位TrueColor,这将是首选。

trans-unit.source: Some terminals (wxt, qt, svg, canvas, win) allow you to attach hypertext to specific points on the graph or elsewhere on the canvas. When the mouse hovers over the anchor point, a pop-up box containing the text is displayed. Terminals that do not support hypertext will display nothing. You must enable the point attribute of the label in order for the hypertext to be anchored. Examples:
trans-unit.target: 一些终端（wxt，qt，svg，canvas，win）允许您将超文本附加到图形上或画布上其他位置的特定点。当鼠标悬停在锚点上时，将显示一个包含文本的弹出框。不支持超文本的终端将不显示任何内容。您必须启用标签的point属性才能锚定超文本。例子：

trans-unit.source: Some terminals have many additional options. The options used by a previous invocation set term <term> <options> of a given <term> are remembered, thus subsequent set term <term> does not reset them. This helps in printing, for instance, when switching among different terminals — previous options don't have to be repeated.
trans-unit.target: 一些终端还有许多其他选择。记住给定<term>的先前调用设置项<term> <options>所使用的选项，因此后续设置项<term>不会重置它们。例如，当在不同终端之间切换时，这有助于打印-不必重复先前的选项。

trans-unit.source: Some terminals support enclosing the label in a box. See set style textbox. Not all terminals can handle boxes for rotated text.
trans-unit.target: 一些终端支持将标签封闭在盒子中。请参阅设置样式文本框。并非所有终端都能处理旋转文本框。

trans-unit.source: Some terminals support the attribute transparent for filled areas. In the case of transparent solid fill areas, the density parameter is interpreted as an alpha value; that is, density 0 is fully transparent, density 1 is fully opaque. In the case of transparent pattern fill, the background of the pattern is either fully transparent or fully opaque.
trans-unit.target: 一些终端支持填充区域透明的属性。对于透明的实心填充区域，将密度参数解释为alpha值。也就是说，密度0是完全透明的，密度1是完全不透明的。在透明图案填充的情况下，图案的背景是完全透明的或完全不透明的。

trans-unit.source: Some terminals support user-defined dash patterns in addition to whatever set of predefined dash patterns they offer.
trans-unit.target: 一些终端除了支持用户定义的破折号图案外,还支持它们提供的任何一组预定义破折号图案。

trans-unit.source: Some terminals use device- or library-specific optimizations to render image data within a rectangular 2D area. This sometimes produces undesirable output, e.g. bad clipping or scaling, missing edges. The pixels keyword tells gnuplot to use generic code that renders the image pixel-by-pixel instead. This rendering mode is slower and may result in much larger output files, but should produce a consistent rendered view on all terminals. (The pixels options was called failsafe mode in previous gnuplot versions.) Example:
trans-unit.target: 一些终端使用特定于设备或库的优化来渲染矩形2D区域内的图像数据。有时这会产生不良的输出，例如不良的裁切或缩放，缺少边缘。的像素关键字告诉GNUPLOT使用呈现所述图像的像素的逐像素而不是通用代码。此渲染模式较慢，可能会导致输出文件大得多，但应在所有终端上产生一致的渲染视图。（在以前的gnuplot版本中，pixels选项称为故障安全模式。）示例：

trans-unit.source: Sometimes the scanning directions in a binary datafile are not consistent with that assumed by gnuplot. These keywords can flip the scanning direction along dimensions x, y, z.
trans-unit.target: 有时,二进制数据文件的扫描方向与gnuplot假设的方向不一致。这些关键字可以沿 x、y、z 维度翻转扫描方向。

trans-unit.target: 可以使用'＆'字符插入长度等于字符串的空格。从而

trans-unit.source: Spaces are treated slightly differently. A space in the string stands for zero or more whitespace characters in the file. That is, "%H %M" can be used to read "1220" and "12 20" as well as "12 20".
trans-unit.target: 空格的处理方式略有不同。字符串中的空格代表文件中的零或多个空白字符。也就是说,"%H %M "可以用来读取 "1220 "和 "12 20 "以及 "12 20"。
